long_description: The Thule Universal Pull Top 6 ski mount is an easy way to load skis and snowboards on to vans and SUVs. Telescoping action brings the carrier to you for simple loading. Wide, ultrasoft rubber arms provide a snug fit without scratching surfaces. Telescoping arms allow skis/snowboards to slide from the roof rack to the side of the vehicle. 30 in. (76.2cm) wide platform holds up to 6 pairs of skis or up to 4 snowboards. Oversize push-button locking arms are easy to open and close while wearing ski gloves. Speed-Link(TM) Universal mounting hardware works with Thule rack systems, round bars and most factory-installed racks (see Fit List). Can be locked in place using Thule One-Key(TM) System lock cylinders; includes 2 keys and 4 locks (2 locks for arm assembly and 2 locks for Speed-Link mounting system).
short_description: The Thule Universal Pull Top 6 ski mount is an easy way to load skis and snowboards on to vans and SUVs. Telescoping action brings the carrier to you for simple loading.
